title: Manage Spending Against an Allowance
description: The contract includes a $20,000 allowance for light fixtures. The PM must help the client make selections while staying within this allowance.

tasks.description: Provide the client with a list of light fixtures from approved vendors.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of options is sent to the client.

tasks.description: As the client makes selections, track the total cost against the $20,000 allowance.
tasks.expected_outcome: A running total of the selected fixtures' cost is maintained.

tasks.description: Notify the client when their selections have reached 90% of the allowance to prevent overspending.
tasks.expected_outcome: A timely notification is sent to the client.
